```{r}
library(expm)
Q <- matrix(c(-2,1,1,0,1,-3,1,1,2,2,-4,0,1,2,3,-6), nrow = 4, byrow = T)
colnames(Q) <- 1:4
rownames(Q) <- 1:4
Q

P <- function(t) expm(t*Q)
P(100)

# part(a)
print("Answer to part(a) is ") 
P(100)[1,1]

# part(b)
print("Answer to part(b) is ") 
P(100)[2,3]

# part(c)
print("Answer to part(c) is ") 
mat <- P(1)
mat[1,3]

# part(d)
print("Answer to part(d) is ") 
P(3)[4,1] * P(1)[3,4]
```
